SEARCH
Package com.monexel.expensetracker.service

Class IncomeServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.monexel.expensetracker.service.IncomeServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IncomeService
@Service public class IncomeServiceImpl extends Object implements IncomeService
Service implementation for managing income records in the Expense Tracker application.

This class provides business logic for adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving income details. It interacts with IncomeRepository for persistence and UserRepository for validating user existence.

Responsibilities:

  • Add new income records for a user.
  • Update existing income details.
  • Delete income records by ID.
  • Retrieve income details by ID or fetch all incomes for a user within an optional date range.

Exception Handling:

  • ResourceNotFoundException is thrown when a user or income record is not found.

Usage Example:

 IncomeRequest request = new IncomeRequest();
 request.setSource("Salary");
 request.setAmount(new BigDecimal("50000"));
 request.setDate(LocalDate.now());
 request.setDescription("Monthly salary");
 request.setUserId(1L);

 IncomeResponse response = incomeService.addIncome(request);
Version:
1.0
Author:
Surya Narayanan G
